Breakthrough/PySceneDetect

Python and OpenCV-based video scene cut detection

Related repos

  • PyTorch computer vision toolkit with self-supervised learning, transformers, and detection models
  • Perceives 3D scenes from videos and photo collections with a persistent state
  • command line tool for cutting video files without re-encoding
  • Video and image annotation tool for computer vision projects
  • Video segmentation model runs on phones
  • Unified benchmark for scene text detection and recognition
  • Video production engine for Python
  • auto video translation and dubbing with python
  • Video processing framework for real-time media applications
  • Cross-platform video editor with curve-based keyframe animations
